attributes.additional_details:
Today the 11th of March , David Duckinfield has admitted that he lied to the enquiry for the disaster at Hillsborough.
 I propose that he should be stripped of his knighthood.This man has lied for almost 26 years, while families have fought for justice, he refelled in his knighood.

I ask the government to take this honour away from David Duckinfield. He has proved today that he was never entitled to it.
